Package GUI

Class Canvas

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • GUI.Canvas
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
    public class Canvas
extends javax.swing.JComponent
    This class provides a component to allow the display of drawings.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Canvas

        public Canvas()
        Creates a Canvas for the display panel. This canvas has a ComponentListener to detect whether the canvas is resized. This canvas has a MouseListener to detect and handle all mouse event over the canvas.

      • clearDrawings

        public boolean clearDrawings​(boolean forcedAction)
        Clear all drawings from the display panel.
        • If forcedAction == true, clears drawings.
        • If forcedAction == false, prompts the user to save current drawings.
        • Returns true if all drawing were cleared.
        Parameters:
        forcedAction -
        Returns:
        boolean
